entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You eliminated an Imperial officer who was providing information to the Rebel Alliance.
entries.journal_entry_description: An Imperial officer is rumored to be aiding the Rebel Alliance. Track down this officer and use his treachery to aid the Empire.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: An Imperial officer is rumored to be aiding the Rebel Alliance. First, you must identify which officer is the traitor.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Based on the information you uncovered, we have identified the traitor: Major Barret Herand. You must now eliminate this spy. Go to his office and access his personal data terminal. This should get his attention.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Kaja Or'Zee: "Based on the information you uncovered, we have identified the traitor: Major Barret Herand. You must now eliminate this spy. Go to his office and access his personal data terminal. This should get his attention."
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Use the Imperial officer's personal data terminal in his office and download all personal information. It is unlikely that this action will go unnoticed.
entries.task03_retrieve_menu_text: Log on to the data terminal
entries.task03_utterance_wave_1: We've been discovered. Someone alert Major Herand!
entries.task03_utterance_wave_2: You may know that I'm a spy, but you won't live to tell anyone!
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Report your success to Kaja Or'Zee.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Examine the guard towers surrounding the retreat for evidence of unauthorized entry.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Use the supply requisition terminal and find out who procured a jamming device that was discovered on an Imperial AT-ST.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: One of the shuttle pilots claims to have seen someone tampering with the Imperial shuttle. Speak with him and get a description of the person he saw.
